resources.string: Get started by adding an app using the button below.
Go back, stop RapidBr, and come back to change these settings.
This feature needs Usage access. You have to enable access for this app through Settings. Tap "OK", and allow the permission for this app.
This feature needs Usage access. But your ROM does not support it. So, this feature will not work on your ROM.
When this app starts, RapidBr will be paused. You can either keep the current brightness, or have RapidBr set a brightness value specific to this app when it starts.
